Returns: the base directory of the cache
getCacheFileBaseDir().Description: Gets the base directory in which the files used to store the contents of cache entries are placed. See @B_android#webkit#CacheManager#CacheResult#getLocalPath_E@.

Returns: true if the HTTP cache is disabled
cacheDisabled().Description: Gets whether the HTTP cache is disabled.

Returns: the cache entry for the specified URL
Parameters: the URL for which a cache entry is requested
a map from HTTP header name to value, to be populated for the returned cache entry
getCacheFile(java.lang.String, java.util.Description: Gets the cache entry for the specified URL, or null if none is found. If a non-null value is provided for the HTTP headers map, and the cache entry needs validation, appropriate headers will be added to the map. The input stream of the CacheEntry object should be closed by the caller when access to the underlying file is no longer required.
getCacheFile(java.lang.String, java.util.FullName: public static CacheManager.CacheResult getCacheFile (String url, Map<String, String> headers)

Returns: true if this was the only running transaction
endCacheTransaction().Description: Ends the innermost cache transaction and returns whether this was the only running transaction.

Returns: true if this is the only running transaction
startCacheTransaction().Description: Starts a cache transaction. Returns true if this is the only running transaction. Otherwise, this transaction is nested inside currently running transactions and false is returned.

Parameters: the URL for which the cache entry should be added
saveCacheFile(java.lang.String, android..Description: Adds a cache entry to the HTTP cache for the specicifed URL. Also closes the cache entry's output stream.
saveCacheFile(java.lang.String, android..FullName: public static void saveCacheFile (String url, CacheManager.CacheResult cacheResult)

ClassDesc: Access to the HTTP cache will be removed in a future release. Manages the HTTP cache used by an application's @B_android#webkit#WebView_E@ instances.
